attributes.action: recognise south ossetia and abkazia so that we get cheaper energy bills
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
it was Georgian aggression that started this war and russian peace keeping and diplomacy that finished it.  Sakashvili is a war criminal who flattened south ossetia with artillery. his country is a rogue state and we should not be backing a rouge state like this.  

russia supplies 38% of Europe's gas.  if we want cheap electric and gas we should recognise south ossetia and abkazia.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
